Malaysia Thailand Tours – Experience the Heavenly Beauty a

Most of the tourists love to visit places like Switzerland, Rome, Paris, Turkey, Dubai to enjoy their vacations with families and friends or for a honeymoon holidays. But part from all these there are counties in South East Asia whose splendor and charms are truly unique and unmatched by any other tourism destinations in the world. Well I am talking about Malaysia dubbed as “Truly Asia” and Thailand lovingly called Land of Smiles. Both the countries of South East Asia are blessed with enchanting tourism attractions and sightseeing places, their rich culture and traditions and the magnificent glory of the bygone era that are scattered all over. So come and enjoy vacations in both these captivating Malaysia and Thailand and experience the splendor of heaven at first go.

Malaysia is lovingly called “Pearl of the Orient” and so this beautiful country offer lots of amazing attractions so visit and explore every bit of its wonderments in a delightful and memorable way. Some of the favorite and enticing tourism attraction that is worth to visit and explore are George Town, Kuala Lumpur, Saha Alam, Malacca Town, Kota Kinabalu, Petling Jaya, Kuala Terengganu, etc. Beside all these destinations, Kuala Lumpur is one of the most visited cities in Malaysia as this city is gifted with harmonious blend of old and modern charm. The sky kissing building to the rustic historical monuments and building, Kuala Lumpur is also home to bustling shopping malls, exotic restaurants and luxury hotels that make the tour to Malaysia truly memorable and exciting. Beside all, tourists here also love to visit Genting. It is also the prominent place of tourist interest in Malaysia that is the ideal place for one and all and offer wonderful opportunity for all ages to delight and enjoy memorable time in this country Malaysia. So plan for Kualalumpur Genting Tour and explore some of its wonderments and treasure remarkable experience to relish in for a long time to go.

Well tourists can also visit to Thailand the Land of Smiles and explore the splendor of some exciting tourism attractions and sightseeing spots. Home to many beguiling and captivating Malaysia Thailand Tour offer tourists to enjoy memorable time taking pleasure in visit to some of the in a delightful way. Grand Palace, Jim Thompson Thai House, Dream World Thai Village, Pottery Museum, Bangkok Planetarium and Science Museum, etc are some of the top enthralling attractions in Thailand that offer tourists to enjoy memorable vacations in a delightful and memorable way. Beside these the country is also famous for its rich culture and traditions, throbbing nightlife, delicious delicacies, cozy accommodation facilities and the balmy climatic condition truly make Thailand the most favourable country for vacations with friends, families and dear ones.

So instead of wandering here and there as most of the tourists do before planning a vacation, come for tour to Malaysia and Thailand and enjoy vacations in this magnetic country in a delightful and memorable way. Truly tourists who visit this place once love to come time and again to take a dip in the heavenly splendor of Malaysia and Thailand, the most favourable holiday countries in South East Asia.

Iconic Attractions to visit and Explore with Malaysia Packag

Malaysia is located in the South East Asia is the most sought after tourist destinations. This beautiful country is called home to myriad amazing tourist destinations to visit and explore. This beautiful country is unique blessed with captivating sight seeing spots, stunning beaches, ultra modern art and architecture, historical monuments, rich heritage and culture are awesome and easily lure the visitors. With addition to all these attractions the fascinating lifestyle, luxurious accommodations, delicious cuisines along with the hospitable locales truly hooks the tourists and tempts them to visit again and again to the wonderland the irresistible Malaysia. This country in Asia is the most favaoured destinations and the modern sky crappers building is very worth to visit with any Malaysia holiday packages .

Beautiful Malaysia is lovingly tagged as “Truly Asia” is one of the magnificent countries in Asia.
This country is gifted with multicultural and captivating attractions and thus visitors to this country visit in thousands, hundred and several through out the year. Some of the prime attractions and destinations which attract the tourist’s lot on their trip to Malaysia are as listed below:

Georgetown
This is the capital city of Penang in Malaysia. Georgetown is located the north-east corner of Penang Island and is truly amazing and awe inspiring and is the third largest city in this beautiful country. The attractions are very captivating and luring and some which are as follows:
• Penang Butterfly Farm
• Monkey beach
• Rainforest Bakery
• Penang Hill
• Chinatown

Cameroon Highlands
The scenic surroundings with soothing amiable climatic conditions hook the visitor’s lot to this scenic place. Cameroon Highlands is a heavenly ambiance and summer retreat for the tourists here. Picture landscapes, Lush meadows, cascading waterfalls and the jungle safari are truly out of this world. The visitors mostly visiting to Kuala Lumpur the capital city of Malaysia with any Kuala Lumpur Tour Packages planned from the leading tour operator never miss to experience the heavenly ambiance of this highland. Some of the attractions which are must see attractions as on the Cameroon Highland are as follows:

• Cameron Valley Tea Plantation
• Big Red Strawberry Farm
• Vegetable Farms
• Museums & Galleries
• Flower Nurseries
• Butterfly Centers

Kelantan
Kelantan meaning the “land of lightening” is one of the popular destinations to tour on with any Malaysia Package Tour. This beautiful city is the capital city of Kota Bharu and is very quite and very far from the hustle a bustle and close to the nature. The lush green paddy fields, fishing villages and the gorgeous beaches grasp the attention of many visitors from every nook and corner of the world. The mesmerizing attractions which are very worth to visit and explore here are:

• GUNUNG STONG
• RIVER CRUISE
• JELAWANG WATERFALLS
• Handicraft Village and Craft Museum
• Cultural Centre
• Kuala Koh

Apart from these Malaysia has many more worthy attractions that can be explored and visited with any well designed packages to Malaysia. So, before the minds get diverse contact a tour operator of your contact and plan a holiday packages to the heaven on the earth, the one and only irresistible Malaysia.

Thailand Top Tourist Places – Must See Some Famous Ones

From the magnificent temples to the evergreen forests, picturesque beaches to the scintillating islands, historical museums, ancient ruins and historical forts, Thailand is the destination that one must visit once during their lifetime.

Well if you are planning for Thailand Tours, you are making a great choice and truly your choice will be appreciated for a long time by your friends and families. Here one can see some of the magnificent places of tourist interest that will give some remarkable memories to treasure and relish in for a long time to go.

Cameroon Highlands in Malaysia - An Ideal Gateway to Escape

Malaysia is well known among tourist as one of the most loved tourist destination in Southeast Asia. But the reason behind making Malaysia so popular among tourism is many but it’s very hard to depict all as people are busy looking for a destination that can beat the summer heat and enjoy the cool romantic ambiance.

If you are looking for an ideal gateway to escape the summer and enjoy memorable time in the blissful cool ambiance of Malaysia, there can be no better place then Cameroon Highlands. Endowed with the refreshing greener with well organised tea gardens, colonial homes and evergreen surrounding where everyone is well greeted by the cool wind blowing from the hills, Cameroon tours on Malaysia Trip is beyond praise.

Well if you want to make your holidays truly pleasant and memorable come to Cameroon Highlands of Malaysia where you can see the expressions of nature beautifully preserved and well expressed. Apart from the scintillating beauty, this scenic hill stations is also famous for its cool amiable climatic conditions that magnets thousands and hundreds of tourists from across the globe. So come and enjoy the most cherished event of lifetime here in Cameroon on your holiday in Malaysia and treasure priceless memories to relish in for a long time to go.

Here one can enjoy the mesmerizing view of the well organised tea gardens, colonial house and on top the scintillating beauty of the Mother Nature in a delightful and memorable way. So come to this nature blessed Cameroon highland and the Ideal gateway to escape from the huff and puff of the summer. Plan your Malaysia Tour and get going to Cameroon where you will find the expressions of nature to its perfection.

So come to Malaysia and enjoy holidays in the blissful ambiance of Cameroon for memorable vacations.

Captivating Malaysia - Home Away From Home for the Visitors

Malaysia is located in South Asia and is truly home away home for the visitors in the entire world. This beautiful island is one most beautiful in the entire world and is becoming one of the hottest tourist destinations in Asia. Malaysia is one of the most captivating countries which are endowed with beguiling natural beauty and the myriad tourist attractions allures intense number of visitors from all over the world. Tourism is a booming industry in this country which contributes immensely to the economy of the country. A wide range of tourist attractions and sheer diversity of tourism destination are astounding. Malaysia from the high tech city to the tropical island, lush hill stations to numerous picturesque beaches truly entices all the visitors and such diversity makes this country bliss for the travelers. Visitors truly teems here to this country throughout the year and enjoy there holiday as never before.

Some of the fascination attractions and the destinations in this country with any Malaysia Holiday Packages bought from a leading tour operator will offer you some wonders and surely these attractions will leave you spell bound on your Malaysia tour.

Kuala Lumpur is the capital city of this country and is one of the most global cities in this Malaysia. This city with rich heritage and with blend of modernism truly attracts many visitors from the world. This capital city of this country truly is magnificent and is hard to explain in words as describing Kuala Lumpur is alike opening a book with various interesting chapters. Some of the attractions which can be explored with Kuala Lumpur tour packages and which are truly sheer wonder are such as the Petronas Twin Tower the tallest twin tower in the entire world, Batu Caves, Central Market Kuala Lumpur and Sri Maha Sakthi Mohambigai Amman Temple.

Genting is one of the most sought after tourist destination in this country and is lovingly called as Las Vegas of Malaysia. The lush green hills and cool climatic conditions allure the visitors of all categories. Genting is located just 52 km away from the capital city of this country and is situated at elevations of 2000 meter above the main sea level. Genting truly will offer you a very peace of mind on your entire Malaysia Genting tour as it is very far from noise, pollution and hustle and bustle of the city. This place is one of the best places in entire world as where one can have that soothing peace and relaxation under the blend of Mother Nature and picturesque scenery. Some of the attractions which attracts all kind of international and local visitors to this place are such as world-class casino, shopping arcades, City of Entertainment, indoor and an outdoor theme parks suitable for the whole family, topsy-turvy for kids, golf course and many alike in a bucket truly is a heaven for the visitors in this country.

Apart from these Malaysia have myriad attractions which truly elate your heart along with your soul as you visit, exploring these will truly make you fall in love and will offer you billion mesmerizing memories which are not easily unleash from your heart till eternity.

Bhaskar writes about various beautiful tours and travel destinations of the world. He is providing valuable information on Malaysia Trip, holiday in Malaysia etc. For more information visit to http://www.malaysiatourpackages.org

Thailand Tours – Elates the Visitors Heart

Thailand is one of the most sought after tourist destinations which are located in the South East Asia. This beautiful country is always teemed with the tourist from the every nook and corner of the world. Thailand is truly the incredible country with beautiful attractions and fabulous destinations to visit. Thailand is also called as the land of Buddha and lovingly called as ‘Land of Smile’. The capital city is country is the Bangkok. The country has 76 provinces in this country. The Buddha devotees from the every nook and corner of the worlds visit to this country at least once in their lifetime. Thailand is one destination which has a bit of something for everyone who visits this country. The vast historical background with very rich culture truly entices many visitors from the different part of the world.

Some of the famous attractions and destinations which will truly be memorable and offer you billion cherish memories as touring to this country with any Thailand Tour packages planned from a leading tour operator of Thailand.

The Grand Palace
The Grand Palace is must see attractions as you visit to the famous city and is also the capital city of Thailand the Bangkok. The Grand Palace is one of the most splendid and striking palaces in the world. This palace was built in the year 1782 during the reign of King Rama I. The palaces, royal gardens and the outstanding Buddha temple is awe inspiring and wonderful and a must see attractions on your Thailand tours.

Phang Nga Bay
This bay is one of the most visited by the tourist here and is become the most popular attractions. This bay is located 60 miles from the island of Phuket and is one of the most picturesque spot in this country. This area is beautifully bounded by the Phuket, Krabi islands and others. Fishing, boating and swimming are enjoyed by the visitors along with it the tourists here also can enjoy some other attractions. The attractions to visit that can be visited as visiting this secluded Phang Nga Bay are Panyee Island, Tone Pariwat Wildlife Sanctuary, Tapan Cave Monastery and Hong Island.

Chiang Mai Night Bazaar
Chiang Mai’s Night Bazaar is obviously the city's most popular must-do attraction and is truly the colorful mix of the regular shops and the stalls offers magical spell on your visit and this creates a sheer market buzz. You can find everything for sell here in this market. This night bazaar is located at the intersection of Chang Khlan Road and Loi Khro Road. The time is set up marketing is from 18:00 hrs to 22:30 hrs in the night. The visitors get lost as they get wonderful time to enjoy the shopping at affordable prices. It is also said that Thailand Tours is not very worth if one does not meet this attractions.

Apart from this there are many attractions that is must see on your visit to this beautiful country in Asia the Thailand. So contact a leading tour operator which offers you mesmerizing memories and joy experience as you treasure the moment of your tours to Thailand anytime till eternity.

For more information visit us at:

Truly Malaysia tourist attractions are endless and more of all they are incredible in look that never fail to envelope the heart of the tourists with their charm and splendor.

Well if you want to enjoy vacation in this mesmerizing Malaysia lovingly called Truly Asia, plan your tour with one of the leading tour operator who will surely organize your travel package to make your holiday memorable and delightful.

On your Malaysia Tour you cannot afford to miss to visit Langkawi which is the premier Island destination that has got global accreditation as one of the most picturesque Island in the world.

Apart from Langkawi, tourist cannot afford to miss to visit Kuala Lumpur the modern city of Malaysia that draped in the modern charm and splendor, with sky-kissing building, bustling malls with modern look, historical building and much more. On Malaysia tour, enjoy visit to the nature blessed Cameroon Highlands, where you can enjoy memorable time with families and friends in the scintillating greenery surfing the cool aromatic air. Malaysia Genting Tour is also very popular as here tourists of all ages are invited. Here on Genting tour tourist can have unlimited fun and have wonderful time playing casino, them attractions as well as spend memorable time in the theme park. Truly Malaysia has incredible tourist attractions that appeals thousands and hundreds of tourist, vacationers and world trotters from across the nook and corner of the globe.

So come and enjoy the vacation with your dear ones in Malaysia and multiply the happiness and joy for a long time to go.

Malaysia Tourism Attractions and Sightseeing Spots

Malaysia is amazingly beautiful and is outstandingly blessed by the natural attractions, scintillating sightseeing spots, modern charm and splendor and more of all man made attractions. It is the destination with complete tourism attractions that tempts great number of tourists and holiday makers from across the globe.

Some of the magnificent tourism attractions that most of the tourists want to see and explore during Malaysia tour is listed below:

Petronas Twin Tower, Kuala Lumpur
Kuala Lumpur is the capital city of Malaysia and an important tourism destination that accounts the maximum number of tourists from all over the world. Kuala Lumpur is the heart of Malaysia as this city is teeming magnificently by the modern splendor like Petronas Twin Tower, Churches, Temples and Mosques, Kuala Lumpur Bird Park, National Art Gallery, National Planetarium, etc. Among these architectural wonders and attractions Petronas Twin Tower is one of the most sought after tourist attractions as it is the prominent land mark of Malaysia.

Malaysia Genting Tour
Malaysia Genting holds all the surprise that tourist want to see and explore during Malaysia Genting Tour. It is the ideal destination where tourist of all ages can enjoy vacations in a delightful and memorable way. Surrounded magnificently by the old equatorial forest, is the entertainment hub with all theme based park, casino and exotic restaurants. Major attraction is the Repley’s Believe it or Not Museum and Wind Turbine powered sky diving stimulating system.

Malaysia Tourism also offer tourist to enjoy beach vacations, island tours, wildlife tours and many others fascinating attractions. The country is also well known for rich culture and tradition and welcoming people who are no less then a friend next to tour door. Malaysia is an incredible tourist destination, so plan the tour with one well known Malaysia tour operator who can help you make your tour the adorable moments of lifetime.
Have a happy journey and holidays in Malaysia.

Trip to Malaysia – Staircase to Heaven

Malaysia is the most beautiful country which is located in the South Asia. This beautiful country is truly the visitor’s hub and is one of the most sought after tourist destination. Malaysia is one of the most emerging tourist destinations truly offers the tourist here a super blend of olden culture with modern culture. This beautiful country will leave you spell bound with its swanky high rise buildings and its gorgeous beaches. The exotic wildlife and the urban villages and many alike will surely make you fall in love with it and this tempts the visitors to visit this beautiful country again and again.

Any Malaysia holiday packages offer the tourist its golden history, rich heritage and the unique lifestyle of the people to explore and enjoy. The colorful festivals, vibrant nightlife and many events easily entice the couples from all over the globe to visit Malaysia once in lifetime. Truly Malaysia is a wonder and the beauty and the charm of the country is thus unable to get along with any other country in the entire world.

Malaysia has wide range of tourist attractions which are truly out of this world to explore and visiting the attractions here truly are like staircase to heaven. Malacca is one of the historical cities which top the list of the attractions in this country. The beautiful monuments, splendid temples, elegant forts and many alike are truly sheer wonder which elates the visitors mind. The Petronas twin tower is another attraction which is breathtakingly beautiful where the visitor folk to explore this wonder in intense number throughout the year. This beautiful twin tower is located in the capital city of Malaysia in Kuala Lumpur. The capital city of this country is also lovingly called as the most high tech and the youngest cities in South Asia which is very worth to visit on your Malaysia Trip.

Apart from these the striking beaches, exotic wildlife, the blossoming gardens, green lush hill stations are some attractions which are not to avoid with any Malaysia package.
